name: Editorify Reviews – Import and Collect Customer Feedbacks from Aliexpress to your Dropshipping Store
author: Editorify

sections.description:
Editorify makes it easy to import authentic Woocommerce reviews from multiple wholesalers into your store and boost customer’s trust, maximize engagement, build social proof and get more sales

►Why Do I Need it?

The biggest reason why online reviews are important to businesses is that ultimately it increases sales by giving consumers the information they need to make the decision to purchase a product and create Fomo to increase Social proof.

Editorify is a Must-Have App for dropshippers who are running their business on WooCommerce and would like to maximize their conversion rate. It helps you to easily import authentic reviews from multiple wholesalers into your store to boost customer’s trust, maximize engagement, build social proof and get more sales.

► WHAT CAN I DO WITH EDITORIFY?

  • Import Product Rating Reviews – Import Reviews & star rating from Aliexpress, Alibaba, Etsy, Dhgate, Taobao, 1688, Wish, Banggood, Gearbest, Walmart, Overstock, Sears, Chinabrands, Lightinthebox, Costco & Sammydress.

  • Write reviews manually – Write your own reviews or let customers leave their own feedback with an option to upload pictures.

  • Rate filter – Choose which reviews to show on the product page – for example only Feedbacks with 4 & 5-star rating

  • Keyword Blacklist – Filter reviews that contain specific keywords you don’t want to show

  • Import Photos – Import photos from multiple sources to your WooCommerce store and link them to any product variant.

  • Import Videos – Import Videos to your WooCommerce store product description with a click of a button.

  • Happy Customers Page – Showcase your product reviews from happy customers in beautiful grid view or list view mode

* Increase your store’s Social Proof – Increase your Conversions and make it looks trustworthy.

►HOW TO USE EDITORIFY?

It was very important for us to make Editorify user-friendly and very easy to use. Once you install the Editorify app, all you have to do is to visit one of our supported websites and click the Editorify icon in order to import reviews. Photos or videos.

►CAN I CANCEL MY ACCOUNT AT ANY TIME?

If you ever decide that this isn’t the right solution for your business, simply cancel your recurring payment.

sections.installation:
Editorify plugin installation is as as easy as it gets, it works with both WordPress and WooCommerce on your websites.

Instructions:

  1. Install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen OR unzip the plugin archive to ‘/wp-content/plugins’
  2. In the WordPress ‘Plugins’ page, activate the plugin.
  3. Select “Editorify” menu item from your admin sidebar.
  4. Click on “Go To Dashboard”
  5. From the Editorify dashboard, Install the Editorify chrome extension
  6. Visit one of the supported wholesalers sites, visit a product page and click on the Editorify extension icon.
sections.faq:
Does editorify have a free plan?

Yes, you can import up to 50 reviews in total with the free plan.

What do i get with the paid plan?

  • Import unlimited reviews

  • Import from all our supported websites

  • Import videos or images.

  • Integration that we have with Oberlo, Importify, Dropified, Dsers, Ali orders, Expressfy, and more.

  • Create Showcase page/happy customer page functionality (highest plan)

  • Powered by Editorify logo badge will be removed

  • Rating filter and the blacklist keywords

  • Edit reviews from the extension

  • Customize the “write a review” form page

I have a small website, can I open an account for free?

Yes! Editorify offers a Free plan.

What sites can I import reviews from?

Using Editorify you can Import Reviews & star ratings from Aliexpress, Amazon, Alibaba, Etsy, Dhgate, Taobao, 1688, Wish, Banggood, Gearbest, Walmart, Overstock, Sears, Chinabrands, Lightinthebox, Costco & Sammydress.

What kind of conversion rate should I expect?

The conversion rate on your store may double, triple or increase even more. The extent of positive effect depends on a number of factors, such as: the attractiveness and relevance to the customer’s needs (and their need for what you offer)

Will I need a web developer to handle code embedding?

No need, after installing the plugin and the chrome extension, you’re good to go!

Can I use my own designs?

Yes! You can tweak the reviews stars colors, font size, text, etc…
